title: From Pedestals to Guillotines
description: As election season comes to a close, we explore our contradictory relationship with winners and losers. We tend to idolize the powerful, but we also enjoy seeing the high and mighty fall. Today we explore this paradox with a 2017 episode that takes us from Hollywood and the White House to the forests of Tanzania.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)

Today we explore this paradox with a 2017 episode that takes us from Hollywood and the White House to the forests of Tanzania.
